Course Materials

Understanding Language book series of Routledge

Books

The following books are recommended for this course:

Linguistics

  • Understanding Language book series of Routledge (link)
    • Understanding morphology (PDF)

Kurdish Linguistics

  • Sorani & Kurmanji reference grammars by W. M. Thackston (PDF)
  • Kurdish dialect studies by Mackenzie, D. N. (PDF)

Computational Linguistics and Natural Language Processing

  • Speech and Language Processing by Daniel Jurafsky and James H. Martin (PDF)
  • The Handbook of Computational Linguistics and Natural Language Processing by Alexander Clark, Chris Fox and Shalom Lappin (PDF)

Programming

  • Natural Language Processing with Python by Steven Bird, Ewan Klein, and Edward Loper (PDF)
  • https://www.learnpython.org/
